name: part_004
file: tmp_【3Dお披露目】刮目せよ！吾輩の力を開放する時ッツ！！#ラプラス・ダークネス3D 【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [V0Zk55CpFEM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Introduction and transition to the song performance.
La+ Darknesss performs a cover of 'Wasurena' (勿忘) by Awesome City Club.
MC section: Takane Lui introduces the 'Hololive Extremely Spicy King' segment and the participants.

subtitles.original: たとえば今君が その瞳 濡らしていたとしてもう
subtitles.english: For example, even if you were wetting those eyes right now,

subtitles.original: 呼ぶ声はもう聞こえない
subtitles.english: The voice that calls out can no longer be heard.

subtitles.original: 永遠の雲を解かすように 君との日々は
subtitles.english: Like dissolving eternal clouds, the days spent with you

subtitles.original: 記憶の中に滲んでいく
subtitles.english: Begin to bleed into my memories.

subtitles.original: 何かを求めれば 何かが
subtitles.english: If you seek something, something else

subtitles.original: 零れ落ちていく
subtitles.english: Spills and falls away.

subtitles.original: そんなこの世界で
subtitles.english: In a world like this.

subtitles.original: 春の風を待つあの花のように
subtitles.english: Like that flower waiting for the spring breeze,

subtitles.original: 君という光があるのなら
subtitles.english: If a light called "you" exists,

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る運命を越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing over the cycling fate,

subtitles.original: 咲かせるさ 愛の花を
subtitles.english: I will make the flowers of love bloom.

subtitles.original: 花束を
subtitles.english: A bouquet of them.

subtitles.original: 願いが叶うのなら 二人の世界 また生きてみたい
subtitles.english: If my wish could come true, I'd want to live in our world once again.

subtitles.original: あの日から芽吹く日々
subtitles.english: The days that have sprouted since that day.

subtitles.original: 水色 花びらはもう 香りを忘れ
subtitles.english: The light blue petals have already forgotten their scent,

subtitles.original: 君への思い枯れていく
subtitles.english: My feelings for you are withering away.

subtitles.original: 満ちてしまいそうな心に
subtitles.english: In a heart that seems like it might overflow,

subtitles.original: 覚えたての愛の美しさを
subtitles.english: The beauty of a love just newly learned...

subtitles.original: ねぇ 咲かせて
subtitles.english: Hey, make it bloom.

subtitles.original: 春の風を待つあの花のように
subtitles.english: Like that flower waiting for the spring breeze,

subtitles.original: 飾らない心でいられたら
subtitles.english: If only I could stay with an unadorned heart,

subtitles.original: 触れられない でも想い煩う
subtitles.english: I can't touch you, but I still worry and pine.

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ この恋を
subtitles.english: I won't forget this love.

subtitles.original: ひとつずつ束ねて
subtitles.english: Binding them together one by one,

subtitles.original: 君という light があるのなら
subtitles.english: If a light called "you" exists,

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る運命を越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing over the cycling fate,

subtitles.original: 咲かせるさ 愛の花を
subtitles.english: I will make the flowers of love bloom.

subtitles.original: 花束を
subtitles.english: A bouquet of them.

subtitles.original: 目指せ100万円！ホロライブ激辛王決定戦！
subtitles.english: Aim for 1 million yen! Hololive Extremely Spicy King Deciding Match!

subtitles.original: 司会は私、holoXの女幹部、鷹嶺ルイがね、お送りさせていただきます。
subtitles.english: I, the female executive of holoX, Takane Lui, will be your host today.

subtitles.original: 今日、100万円を目指して激辛を喰らう猛者たちがここに集まってくださいました。
subtitles.english: Today, the brave souls who will eat extremely spicy food to aim for 1 million yen have gathered here.

subtitles.original: 一人ずつ自己紹介してもらいましょうか。
subtitles.english: Let's have them introduce themselves one by one.

subtitles.original: ワーカホリックにスパイスは必須！
subtitles.english: Spice is a must for a workaholic!

subtitles.original: ということでホロライブスタッフの友人Aです。よろしくお願いしますー。
subtitles.english: And so, I'm Hololive staff member Yuujin A. Nice to meet you!
